name: Freezingly Warm
description:
Control the temperature - help your guy to get trough his journey! 

How to play?

Press the FUN button. Or hold it. That's all. When you press the button the temperature changes - turn it into your advantage!

Good to know
  • You can restart the level by pressing ESC -> Restart level
  • You can switch between Fahrenheit and Celsius by pressing ESC -> Change to Fahrenheit/Celsius. This doesn't change the gameplay in any way.

- Made for the FUN Button Jam.
